UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Solution structure and membrane interaction mode of an antimicrobial peptide gaegurin 4
Literature.Author: Chi SW, Kim JS, Kim DH, Lee SH, Park YH, Han KH

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Micrococcus luteus(MIC=2.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=50µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis(MIC=50µg/ml),Shigella dysenteriae(MIC=25µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=25µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=25µg/ml),Salmonella typhimurium(MIC=75µg/ml),Proteus mirabilis(MIC=50µg/ml),Serratia marcescens(MIC=>100µg/ml),Candida albicans(MIC=>100µg/ml),Saccharomyces cerevisiae(MIC=25µg/ml)
